front.title: Path Computation Element communication Protocol extension for relationship between LSPs and Attributes

abstract.t: The Path Computation Element (PCE) provides functions of path computation in support of traffic engineering in networks controlled by Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) and Generalized MPLS (GMPLS). This document defines a mechanism to create associations between a set of LSPs and a set of attributes (such as configuration parameters, policy or behaviors).
